duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct investigations of potential/suspected financial crimes and/or fraud using analytic techniques and tools.
Apply enhanced due diligence on high risk customers and perform financial analysis.
Utilize knowledge of bank systems, processes, and contacts to gather and compile evidence.
Prepare case documentation, reports, and suspicious activity reports (SARs) for compliance.
Interview customers, employees, and suspects, and trace financial transactions.
Assess internal controls and procedures associated with fraud cases, making recommendations to prevent future losses.
Maintain updated information on systems and documentation and comply with regulatory requirements.
Participate in special projects and assist with computer crime investigations.
Be aware of risk within their functional area and observe all policies, procedures, laws, regulations, and risk limits.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree OR an equivalent combination of education and experience. Knowledge of financial laws and regulations
